segments.Segment: my cat was so cute when
he chased his tail in circles
my mom just yelled at me for leaving my dirty dishes in the
sink and it made me feel really disrespected
the roller coaster was so tall and scary
but i felt a rush when i went down
my dog loves to play fetch
but sometimes he gets a bit too enthusiastic
my brother always takes the controller from me when we
are playing games and it is so frustrating
my cat loves to play with strings
but sometimes he swallows them and gets sick
i was so excited for my vacation
but it got cancelled due to the hurricane
i am really scared of heights
but i want to try skydiving someday

tv show has come to an end
i am so glad that exam is over
but i am also worried about the grade

is really frustrating but i know i have to do it

but then i realized it was just a fake one

not study so i am really nervous about how i will do
my friend invited me to a party but i found
out it was a prank i was so embarrassed and angry
my boss just yelled at me in front
of everyone and it was so humiliating
i saw a shooting star but it
made me realize how small we are in the universe
my friend told me she saw a ghost in her house and at first i
did not believe her but then i went to her house and heard strange noises too
i saw a puppy in the park
and it made my day
i was so excited to try the new roller coaster but when i

i am really disappointed that i did not get the
job but i am also a little relieved
my mom is always trying to help me
but sometimes it is just annoying

a lot of homework
